Who: SCORPONOK, RODIMUS, SCOURGE, CYCLONUS, Hydras, Darkhawk, Tuscon, Night=
shift
Location: Black Fortress - Throne Room

Rodimus chuckled as the other=
s in the room once again fell under the
sway of Hydras and the Predacons. W=
ith the grinding of gears he
transformed assuming his robot mode and looked=
 around, his weapon
drawn and ready for action. He glanced at Tuscon and th=
en the other
Autobots and Maximals, "Heh, thought you guys could break in h=
ere and
defeat us? Don't you know that you can't win?!?" Rodimus paused and=

then chuickled again, although this time it was a little weaker and
less s=
ure, "yeah, you can't win, so why even try."

Rodimus shook his head and sm=
iled as he helped collect any weapons
that are discarded.

Scourge, much li=
ke Rodimus began helping with any weapons that are
given over, and nudging =
the prisoners in the right directions. "So
disappointing." Scourge said as =
he shook his head sadly at the
Autobots and Maximals, "I looked forward to =
the battle. maybe next
time."

Scorponok just stood grinning, or atleast as=
 close to grinning as his
face plate would allow. He looked at Nightshift, =
"Is this what you
meant by get it?" he said, the sarcasm thick in his voice=
. "I think we
got it then, yes we did." he chuckled at his own joke.

As al=
l this was going on the doors slid open and Cyclonus stood there,
weapon dr=
awns and optics darting around the room. The cyclonus that
stood there, whi=
le familiar to most, was very different from the last
time Tuscon had seen =
him before he lost his sight. This Cyclonus was a
little taller and sleeker=
, even in his robot mode his lined and form
bespoke speed and aerodynamics.=
 He seemd larger and more imposing than
when he last stood before him, his =
armor thicker and more resilliant
than when he was a simple lacky for Galva=
tron. It is as if he had
grown into something more than what he was, even h=
is spark no longer
registered as pure Decepticon, there was that aspect tha=
t was always
Unicronian, however on his chest was emblazed the purple symbo=
l of the
Decepticon forces.

Upon seeing the turn of events Cyclonus nodded=
 satisfactorilly as he
turned to Hydras, "What ever wave that was from Tusc=
on awakened
Jhiaxus from stassis. He has the security section secured." He =
turned
his gaze on Tuscon, "We will have to have it analyzed to see what ev=
er
defence to it can be mounted. It seemed to have a more pronounced
affect=
 on your Decepticon and predacon forces."

(TAG)

OOC: The changes I descri=
bed are for Tuscon's benefit as well as those
who have not seen him a long =
while. Hydras is already aware of this,
as are the rest of the preds. These=

rebuilding him as well as the changes that he=
 had undergone from the
matrix enhancement. For any of the Predacons he sho=
uld look the same,
and there should be no surprises, only the Maximals and =
Autobots who
haven't seen him in a while, especaily tuscon who hasn't seen =
him in a
very long while should there be the change. - I hope that makes se=
nse.

Preston
